title: Proposer using builder panics in Deneb

labels.name: Deneb
labels.description: PRs or issues for the Deneb upgrade

body:
Looks like panic happens if there's no blob. We should no op here

```
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/v4/api/client/builder.(*BlindedBlobsBundle).ToProto(0x0)
	api/client/builder/types.go:1166 +0x2e
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/v4/api/client/builder.(*BuilderBidDeneb).ToProto(0xc006c86360)
	api/client/builder/types.go:1137 +0x4a
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/v4/api/client/builder.(*ExecHeaderResponseDeneb).ToProto(0xc007d62ae0)
	api/client/builder/types.go:1121 +0x29
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/v4/api/client/builder.(*Client).GetHeader(0xc0077ce9f0?, {0xe079d8, 0xc0077cea20}, 0x300469a?, {0x51, 0xa0, 0x50, 0xb8, 0xb6, 0x99, ...}, ...)
	api/client/builder/client.go:229 +0x6d6
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/v4/beacon-chain/builder.(*Service).GetHeader(0xc0014d68c0, {0xe079a0?, 0xc0077ce9f0?}, 0x1dcc633?, {0x51, 0xa0, 0x50, 0xb8, 0xb6, 0x99, ...}, ...)
	beacon-chain/builder/service.go:123 +0x1a7
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/v4/beacon-chain/rpc/prysm/v1alpha1/validator.(*Server).getPayloadHeaderFromBuilder(0xc001ad2b40, {0xe079d8?, 0xc0077ce960?}, 0x1?, 0x28?)
	beacon-chain/rpc/prysm/v1alpha1/validator/proposer_bellatrix.go:152 +0x459
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/v4/beacon-chain/rpc/prysm/v1alpha1/validator.(*Server).getBuilderPayloadAndBlobs(0xc001ad2b40?, {0xe079d8?, 0xc007833bc0?}, 0xe1e5a0?, 0xc00dd3bf80?)
	beacon-chain/rpc/prysm/v1alpha1/validator/proposer_execution_payload.go:271 +0x1d0
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/v4/beacon-chain/rpc/prysm/v1alpha1/validator.(*Server).GetBeaconBlock(0xc001ad2b40, {0xe079d8?, 0xc007833b90?}, 0xc004b20a80)
	beacon-chain/rpc/prysm/v1alpha1/validator/proposer.go:156 +0xed5
```
